  • Method Details

    • setInboundConnection

      public void setInboundConnection(ExagonProtocolEnum protocol, StackConfiguration config, IExagonProtocolMapperInbound protocolMapper) throws InfraException
      Description copied from interface: IExagon
      Sets an inbound network connection based on the specified protocol, stack configuration, and protocol mapper, to receive incoming requests (and also send a reply to them).

      The inbound network connection is enabled through an Exagon stack that represents a server with the provided configuration details. This server will listen for network events and redirect these events to the given protocol mapper for translation between external and internal network events.

      Specified by:
      setInboundConnection in interface IExagon
      Parameters:
      protocol - the network protocol to be used for the connection (e.g., HTTP, Diameter, LDAP, Kafka)
      config - the stack configuration for the connection, including server settings and a list of channels
      protocolMapper - the protocol mapper responsible for translating external network events to internal events and vice versa, filling the gap between the business logic and the Exagon stack
      Throws:
      InfraException

    • registerExternalServer

      public IExagonExternalServer registerExternalServer(ExagonProtocolEnum protocol, StackConfiguration config, IExagonProtocolMapperOutbound protocolMapper) throws InfraException
      Description copied from interface: IExagon
      Registers an outbound network connection while creating an external server based on the specified protocol, stack configuration, and protocol mapper, to send outgoing requests (and also receive a reply from them).

      The external server contains the provided configuration details and is linked to the provided protocol mapper that will translate the objects sent by the business logic through the external server.

      Specified by:
      registerExternalServer in interface IExagon
      Parameters:
      protocol - the network protocol to be used for the connection (e.g., HTTP, Diameter, LDAP, Kafka)
      config - the stack configuration for the connection, including server settings and a list of channels
      protocolMapper - the protocol mapper responsible for translating external network events to internal events and vice versa, filling the gap between the business logic and the Exagon stack
      Returns:
      the external server
      Throws:
      InfraException

    • setWorkflow

      public void setWorkflow(IExagonWorkFlow workflow)

    • start

      public void start()
      Description copied from interface: IExagon
      Startups Exagon with all the configured set-up.

      After this point, it is not possible to edit the configurations provided.

      Specified by:
      start in interface IExagon

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Specified by:
